column2:
In 
the  light  of  the  decision  by  the  Supreme  Court  in  SC  Appeal  75/10  and  also  considering  the

submission made by all  the  parties before this court 
I see no  reason 
to  extend the  stay order already 
issued by this court.
Extension of stay order is  refused.
PRESIDENT OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
